Introduction
This topic contains instructions for establishing a withholding to offset a Veteran’s receipt of drill pay, including
determining the
amount of the withholding
effective date of the withholding
, and
date range for withholding benefits
handling advance notice of a Veteran’s receipt of drill pay
temporary 100-percent disability ratings in effect on the last day of the fiscal year
withholdings that exceed the rate of payment on October 1
actions to take when the monthly rate of payment at the end of the fiscal year is $0.00
action to take when withholding benefits from the first day of the current fiscal year will affect the future rate of payment
actions to take when a Veteran's benefits are subject to reduction/withholding based on incarceration and receipt of drill pay
action to take when VA is/was apportioning the benefits of a Veteran who received drill pay
circumstances necessitating revision and reissuance of a notice of proposed adverse action
, and
making award adjustments in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS)
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Withholding and Restoration of Benefits Associated With Receipt of Drill Pay
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
